equations: class="subtitle">100 Methods for Scientific Problem Solving
type="text" class="search-box" id="searchBox" placeholder="Search approaches, logic, or concepts
hypotheses:
global behavior", "foundation": "field_theory", "builds_to": "statistical_mechanics"},
            {"sequence": 14, "approach": "statistical_mechanics", "logic": "model microscopic randomness → calculate statistical averages → derive macroscopic laws", "foundation": "statistical_mechanics", "builds_to": "unification"},
            {"sequence": 15, "approach": "theoretical_unification", "logic": "multiple valid descriptions exist → find unifying mathematical framework", "foundation": "unification", "builds_to": "correspondence"},
            {"sequence": 16, "approach": "correspondence_principle", "logic": "new theory must work → reduce to known theory in appropriate limits", "foundation": "correspondence", "builds_to": "falsification"},
            {"sequence": 17, "approach": "falsificationism", "logic": "make testable predictions → attempt to disprove → reject failed theories", "foundation": "falsification", "builds_to": "bayesian_inference"},
            {"sequence": 18, "approach": "bayesian_updating", "logic": "start with prior probability → update with new evidence → calculate posterior probability", "foundation": "bayesian_inference", "builds_to": "evolutionary_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 19, "approach": "comparative_evolution", "logic": "compare variations across cases → trace historical changes → identify mechanisms", "foundation": "evolutionary_analysis", "builds_to": "paradox_resolution"},
            {"sequence": 20, "approach": "paradox_postulate_method", "logic": "accept logical contradictions → derive mathematical consequences → test empirically", "foundation": "paradox_resolution", "builds_to": "operational_definition"},
            {"sequence": 21, "approach": "operational_measurement", "logic": "focus only on measurables → construct mathematical operators → make predictions", "foundation": "operational_definition", "builds_to": "authority_synthesis"},
            {"sequence": 22, "approach": "scholastic_synthesis", "logic": "combine accepted authorities → apply logical reasoning → reach conclusions", "foundation": "authority_synthesis", "builds_to": "strategic_optimization"},
            {"sequence": 23, "approach": "game_theory_optimization", "logic": "model strategic decision-makers → find optimal strategies → predict equilibrium outcomes", "foundation": "strategic_optimization", "builds_to": "computational_simulation"},
            {"sequence": 24, "approach": "monte_carlo_simulation", "logic": "use random sampling → approximate through statistics → solve intractable problems", "foundation": "computational_simulation", "builds_to": "information_theory"},
            {"sequence": 25, "approach": "information_quantification", "logic": "quantify information content → measure transmission efficiency → optimize communication", "foundation": "information_theory", "builds_to": "paradigm_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 26, "approach": "paradigm_shift_analysis", "logic": "normal science → accumulate anomalies → revolutionary paradigm shift → new normal", "foundation": "paradigm_analysis", "builds_to": "emergence_complexity"},
            {"sequence": 27, "approach": "complexity_emergence", "logic": "simple local rules → observe emergent system behavior → understand complexity", "foundation": "emergence_complexity", "builds_to": "network_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 28, "approach": "network_structure_analysis", "logic": "map network connections → analyze structural properties → predict emergent behaviors", "foundation": "network_analysis", "builds_to": "pattern_learning"},
            {"sequence": 29, "approach": "pattern_template_matching", "logic": "identify recurring patterns → create templates → match new instances to templates", "foundation": "pattern_learning", "builds_to": "correlation_mining"},
            {"sequence": 30, "approach": "correlation_analysis", "logic": "examine relationships between variables → measure correlation strength → identify dependencies", "foundation": "correlation_mining", "builds_to": "novel_synthesis"},
            {"sequence": 31, "approach": "categorical_composition", "logic": "decompose into basic categories → identify morphisms → compose complex structures", "foundation": "novel_synthesis", "builds_to": "structural_mapping"},
            {"sequence": 32, "approach": "topological_invariance", "logic": "identify properties unchanged by continuous deformation → classify by invariants → predict stability", "foundation": "structural_analysis", "builds_to": "multi_scale_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 33, "approach": "correspondence_mapping", "logic": "establish bijections between domains → translate problems → solve in simpler domain", "foundation": "theoretical_unification", "builds_to": "mathematical_translation"},
            {"sequence": 34, "approach": "logical_quantum_reasoning", "logic": "apply superposition to logical states → reason about multiple possibilities → collapse to conclusions", "foundation": "paradox_resolution", "builds_to": "multi_valued_logic"},
            {"sequence": 35, "approach": "variational_principles", "logic": "identify quantity to optimize → vary parameters → find extremal solutions", "foundation": "optimization_theory", "builds_to": "equilibrium_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 36, "approach": "phase_space_analysis", "logic": "map system states to phase space → track trajectories → identify attractors and repellers", "foundation": "dynamical_systems", "builds_to": "stability_prediction"},
            {"sequence": 37, "approach": "causal_chain_tracing", "logic": "identify proximate causes → trace back to root causes → construct causal diagrams", "foundation": "causal_analysis", "builds_to": "intervention_planning"},
            {"sequence": 38, "approach": "information_geometry", "logic": "treat information states as geometric points → measure information distance → optimize paths", "foundation": "geometric_reasoning", "builds_to": "optimal_inference"},
            {"sequence": 39, "approach": "flow_decomposition", "logic": "decompose complex flows → analyze component behaviors → recompose for understanding", "foundation": "systems_analysis", "builds_to": "flow_optimization"},
            {"sequence": 40, "approach": "scale_invariance_detection", "logic": "test behavior at multiple scales → identify scale-free properties → extract universal laws", "foundation": "multiscale_analysis", "builds_to": "universal_principles"},
            {"sequence": 41, "approach": "constraint_propagation", "logic": "identify local constraints → propagate through system → find global solutions", "foundation": "constraint_satisfaction", "builds_to": "feasibility_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 42, "approach": "algorithmic_reduction", "logic": "express problem algorithmically → reduce to simpler known problems → apply known solutions", "foundation": "computational_complexity", "builds_to": "efficiency_analysis"},
            {"sequence": 43, "approach": "spectral_decomposition", "logic": "decompose into frequency components → analyze spectrum → reconstruct with insights", "foundation": "frequency_analysis", "builds_to": "resonance_detection"},
            {"sequence": 44, "approach": "critical_point_analysis", "logic": "find where derivatives vanish → classify critical points → predict system behavior", "foundation": "calculus_reasoning", "builds_to": "bifurcation_prediction"},
            {"sequence": 45, "approach": "symmetry_exploitation", "logic": "identify system symmetries → apply symmetry operations → simplify through invariance", "foundation": "group_theory_reasoning", "builds_to": "conservation_discovery"},
            {"sequence": 46, "approach": "ergodic_reasoning", "logic": "assume time average equals ensemble average → make statistical predictions → verify ergodicity", "foundation": "statistical_reasoning", "builds_to": "long_term_prediction"},
            {"sequence": 47, "approach": "sheaf_theoretic_reasoning", "logic": "attach local data consistently → verify compatibility → construct global picture", "foundation": "local_global_principle", "builds_to": "consistency_verification"},
            {"sequence": 48, "approach": "compositional_modularity", "logic": "identify modular components → understand interfaces → compose for complexity", "foundation": "modular_reasoning", "builds_to": "scalable_design"},
            {"sequence": 49, "approach": "concentration_analysis", "logic": "identify where values concentrate → analyze deviation bounds → make probabilistic guarantees", "foundation": "probability_theory", "builds_to": "reliability_bounds"},
            {"sequence": 50, "approach": "duality_exploitation", "logic": "identify dual formulation → solve in dual space → translate back to primal", "foundation": "duality_theory", "builds_to": "alternative_perspectives"},
            {"sequence": 51, "approach": "recursive_decomposition", "logic": "break into subproblems → solve recursively → combine solutions hierarchically", "foundation": "divide_and_conquer", "builds_to": "hierarchical_synthesis"},
            {"sequence": 52, "approach": "boundary_condition_analysis", "logic": "examine extreme cases → understand limits → interpolate interior behavior", "foundation": "limit_analysis", "builds_to": "completeness_checking"},
            {"sequence": 53, "approach": "invariant_discovery", "logic": "propose potential invariants → verify preservation → use for simplification", "foundation": "conservation_reasoning", "builds_to": "symmetry_exploitation"},
            {"sequence": 54, "approach": "dimensional_analysis", "logic": "identify relevant dimensions → form dimensionless groups → discover scaling laws", "foundation": "unit_analysis", "builds_to": "similarity_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 55, "approach": "analogy_transfer", "logic": "identify structural similarity → map between domains → transfer solution methods", "foundation": "analogical_reasoning", "builds_to": "cross_domain_insight"},
            {"sequence": 56, "approach": "contradiction_resolution", "logic": "identify contradictory requirements → find hidden assumptions → resolve through refinement", "foundation": "dialectical_reasoning", "builds_to": "assumption_clarification"},
            {"sequence": 57, "approach": "emergence_prediction", "logic": "identify micro-rules → simulate interactions → predict macro-phenomena", "foundation": "bottom_up_reasoning", "builds_to": "collective_behavior"},
            {"sequence": 58, "approach": "constraint_relaxation", "logic": "start with over-constrained problem → systematically relax constraints → find feasible region", "foundation": "optimization_theory", "builds_to": "solution_existence"},
            {"sequence": 59, "approach": "symmetry_breaking_analysis", "logic": "identify perfect symmetry → find instabilities → predict broken symmetry states", "foundation": "stability_theory", "builds_to": "phase_transition_prediction"},
            {"sequence": 60, "approach": "information_bottleneck", "logic": "identify information flow → find bottlenecks → optimize compression while preserving relevance", "foundation": "information_theory", "builds_to": "efficient_representation"},
            {"sequence": 61, "approach": "perturbative_expansion", "logic": "identify small parameter → expand in series → compute corrections systematically", "foundation": "approximation_theory", "builds_to": "accuracy_improvement"},
            {"sequence": 62, "approach": "fixed_point_iteration", "logic": "formulate as fixed point problem → iterate mapping → converge to solution", "foundation": "iterative_methods", "builds_to": "equilibrium_finding"},
            {"sequence": 63, "approach": "generating_function_method", "logic": "encode sequence in function → manipulate algebraically → extract coefficients", "foundation": "combinatorial_reasoning", "builds_to": "counting_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 64, "approach": "variational_inequality", "logic": "formulate as inequality → find feasible region → optimize within constraints", "foundation": "constrained_optimization", "builds_to": "equilibrium_characterization"},
            {"sequence": 65, "approach": "homogenization_theory", "logic": "identify multiple scales → average over fast scales → derive effective equations", "foundation": "multiscale_reasoning", "builds_to": "coarse_graining"},
            {"sequence": 66, "approach": "bifurcation_tracking", "logic": "vary control parameter → detect qualitative changes → map bifurcation diagram", "foundation": "dynamical_analysis", "builds_to": "stability_boundaries"},
            {"sequence": 67, "approach": "inverse_problem_solving", "logic": "start from desired output → work backwards to input → verify forward solution", "foundation": "reverse_engineering", "builds_to": "design_synthesis"},
            {"sequence": 68, "approach": "martingale_reasoning", "logic": "identify fair game property → use stopping times → derive probabilistic bounds", "foundation": "stochastic_analysis", "builds_to": "risk_assessment"},
            {"sequence": 69, "approach": "renormalization_reasoning", "logic": "identify divergences → introduce cutoffs → absorb into redefined parameters", "foundation": "scale_analysis", "builds_to": "effective_theory"},
            {"sequence": 70, "approach": "cohomological_obstruction", "logic": "attempt local solutions → identify global obstructions → classify by cohomology", "foundation": "topological_reasoning", "builds_to": "impossibility_proofs"},
            {"sequence": 71, "approach": "lagrangian_relaxation", "logic": "move hard constraints to objective → solve relaxed problem → recover feasibility", "foundation": "optimization_theory", "builds_to": "bound_computation"},
            {"sequence": 72, "approach": "spectral_clustering", "logic": "construct affinity matrix → compute eigenvectors → partition by spectral gap", "foundation": "linear_algebra", "builds_to": "natural_groupings"},
            {"sequence": 73, "approach": "bootstrap_reasoning", "logic": "assume minimal structure → derive consequences → verify self-consistency", "foundation": "self_reference", "builds_to": "foundational_derivation"},
            {"sequence": 74, "approach": "saddle_point_method", "logic": "find critical points of action → expand around saddle → compute dominant contribution", "foundation": "asymptotic_analysis", "builds_to": "large_deviation_theory"},
            {"sequence": 75, "approach": "degree_theoretic_reasoning", "logic": "count algebraic constraints → compute degrees of freedom → predict solution count", "foundation": "algebraic_topology", "builds_to": "existence_theorems"},
            {"sequence": 76, "approach": "modular_arithmetic_reasoning", "logic": "reduce modulo primes → solve in finite fields → lift to integers", "foundation": "number_theory", "builds_to": "computational_algebra"},
            {"sequence": 77, "approach": "continuation_method", "logic": "start from known solution → continuously deform problem → track solution path", "foundation": "homotopy_theory", "builds_to": "global_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 78, "approach": "dilation_analysis", "logic": "study behavior under scaling → identify self-similar solutions → classify by scaling exponents", "foundation": "scale_invariance", "builds_to": "critical_exponents"},
            {"sequence": 79, "approach": "morse_stratification", "logic": "decompose by critical values → analyze strata separately → assemble global picture", "foundation": "differential_topology", "builds_to": "structural_stability"},
            {"sequence": 80, "approach": "operator_theoretic_reasoning", "logic": "reformulate as operator equation → analyze spectrum → solve via functional analysis", "foundation": "abstract_analysis", "builds_to": "infinite_dimensional_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 81, "approach": "combinatorial_optimization", "logic": "enumerate feasible solutions → prune search space → find optimal efficiently", "foundation": "discrete_optimization", "builds_to": "exact_algorithms"},
            {"sequence": 82, "approach": "probabilistic_method", "logic": "prove existence probabilistically → derandomize if needed → construct explicitly", "foundation": "probabilistic_reasoning", "builds_to": "existence_proofs"},
            {"sequence": 83, "approach": "compactness_argument", "logic": "take limits of approximations → extract convergent subsequence → pass to limit", "foundation": "topological_reasoning", "builds_to": "existence_via_limits"},
            {"sequence": 84, "approach": "monotonicity_method", "logic": "identify monotone structure → use order preservation → iterate to fixed point", "foundation": "order_theory", "builds_to": "comparison_principles"},
            {"sequence": 85, "approach": "barrier_function_method", "logic": "construct barriers → prove solution stays within → derive bounds", "foundation": "analytical_techniques", "builds_to": "a_priori_estimates"},
            {"sequence": 86, "approach": "coupling_argument", "logic": "couple two processes → analyze joint evolution → transfer properties", "foundation": "probability_theory", "builds_to": "comparison_theorems"},
            {"sequence": 87, "approach": "energy_method", "logic": "identify energy functional → prove decay or conservation → derive stability", "foundation": "variational_analysis", "builds_to": "long_time_behavior"},
            {"sequence": 88, "approach": "maximum_principle", "logic": "find where maximum occurs → analyze at maximum → derive global bounds", "foundation": "partial_differential_equations", "builds_to": "qualitative_behavior"},
            {"sequence": 89, "approach": "minimax_reasoning", "logic": "minimize maximum loss → find saddle points → achieve robustness", "foundation": "game_theory", "builds_to": "worst_case_optimization"},
            {"sequence": 90, "approach": "convexification", "logic": "identify non-convex aspects → construct convex relaxation → recover original solution", "foundation": "convex_analysis", "builds_to": "global_optimization"},
            {"sequence": 91, "approach": "residue_calculus", "logic": "identify singularities → compute residues → evaluate via contour integration", "foundation": "complex_analysis", "builds_to": "exact_evaluation"},
            {"sequence": 92, "approach": "separation_of_variables", "logic": "assume factored form → derive separated equations → solve independently", "foundation": "partial_differential_equations", "builds_to": "analytical_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 93, "approach": "fourier_analysis", "logic": "decompose into frequencies → analyze in frequency domain → reconstruct solution", "foundation": "harmonic_analysis", "builds_to": "spectral_methods"},
            {"sequence": 94, "approach": "green_function_method", "logic": "solve for point source → use superposition → construct general solution", "foundation": "linear_systems", "builds_to": "integral_representations"},
            {"sequence": 95, "approach": "weak_formulation", "logic": "multiply by test functions → integrate by parts → solve in weak sense", "foundation": "functional_analysis", "builds_to": "generalized_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 96, "approach": "asymptotic_matching", "logic": "find inner and outer solutions → match in overlap region → construct uniform approximation", "foundation": "perturbation_theory", "builds_to": "multiscale_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 97, "approach": "integral_transform_method", "logic": "apply suitable transform → solve in transform space → invert to get solution", "foundation": "operational_calculus", "builds_to": "closed_form_solutions"},
            {"sequence": 98, "approach": "geometric_series_reasoning", "logic": "identify repeating structure → sum geometric series → find closed form", "foundation": "series_analysis", "builds_to": "exact_formulas"},
            {"sequence": 99, "approach": "inclusion_exclusion_principle", "logic": "count with overlaps → subtract overcounting → add back exclusions", "foundation": "combinatorial_reasoning", "builds_to": "exact_counting"},
            {"sequence": 100, "approach": "pigeonhole_principle", "logic": "count objects and containers → apply pigeonhole logic → prove existence", "foundation": "combinatorial_reasoning", "builds_to": "existence_arguments"}
        ];
